Sentencas: The structure, magnetism, transport and thermal expansion of the perovskite oxide LaNi0.5Fe0.5O3 were studied over a wide range of temperatures.
Titulo: Structural, magnetic and electronic properties of LaNi0.5Fe0.5O3 in the temperature range 5-1000 K

Sentencas: Neutron time-of-flight data have shown that this compound undergoes a first-order phase transition between similar to 275 and similar to 310K. The structure transforms from orthorhombic (Pbnm) at low temperatures to rhombohedral (R (3) over barc) above room temperature.
Titulo: Structural, magnetic and electronic properties of LaNi0.5Fe0.5O3 in the temperature range 5-1000 K

Sentencas: This phase transition is the cause for the previously observed co-existence of phases at room temperature.
Titulo: Structural, magnetic and electronic properties of LaNi0.5Fe0.5O3 in the temperature range 5-1000 K

Sentencas: The main structural modification associated with the phase transition is the change of tilting pattern of the octahedra from a(+)b(-)b(-) at low temperatures to a(-)a(-)a(-) at higher.
Titulo: Structural, magnetic and electronic properties of LaNi0.5Fe0.5O3 in the temperature range 5-1000 K

Sentencas: Magnetic data strongly suggests that a spin-glass magnetic state exists in the sample below 83 K consistent with the absence of magnetic ordering peaks in the neutron data collected at 30K. At high temperatures the sample behaves as a small polaron electronic conductor with two regions of slightly different activation energies of 0.07 and 0.05 eV above and below 553 K, respectively.
Titulo: Structural, magnetic and electronic properties of LaNi0.5Fe0.5O3 in the temperature range 5-1000 K

Sentencas: The dilatometric data show an average thermal expansion coefficient of 14.7 x 10(-6) K-1 which makes this material compatible with frequently used electrolytes in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Structural, magnetic and electronic properties of LaNi0.5Fe0.5O3 in the temperature range 5-1000 K
